text: TOPOS has always been a steady, reliable design and architecture firm.  Their team is hardworking and will always deliver the job, despite the challenges.  As with any service-based contract, much also depends on the client's every changing demands especially since house projects take months if not years to complete.  But kudos to the team for always doing what it takes to finish up the job so that all parties are fairly treated.  Professionalism is getting the job done despite the challenges.

The team exhibited perfessionalism, and we were able to forge a close knitting relationship with the wonderful designers. Design is excecuted well ahead of time, and we were very satisfied with the overall project. ü§óü§ó

Unprofessional. Very poor workmanship and equally sloppy supervision. Almost everything had to be rectified and reworked multiple times, causing delays and added costs. No accountabilty, No real attention to quality or details. Always ready with excuses when problems pointed out. Delay after delay. Nightmarish contractor architect.
I had a very good experience with them. They have great ideas, they do what they say, and their communication is on point. Highly recommend them!

Even with the Covid situation, they were very Professional, prim and proper, held our hands throughout our 1st landed home construction and provided us with a sense of security coz we were very concern that covid affected everything‚Ä¶ üëç very very good. Thanks Alan and team god bless you
